info.title: Bank Account Entry
info.description:
A balance-relevant entry for a Bank Account. A bank account is an account that holds funds in a bank and is subject to deposits and withdrawals.
You can use this API to retrieve bank account entries for a particular bank account.

Use:
The API can be used in scenarios where bank account entries for a particular bank account shall be displayed.

Remark:
The service Bank Account Entry is assigned to service group Transactional Banking.

General:
The properties of the EDM that are based on a code GDT do not contain supplementary components (e.g. listID) that are known from the GDTs of the enterprise services.

x-sap-shortText: Query bank account entries for a particular bank account using this synchronous inbound service

get.description: Is a request to query bank account entries

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description:
Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionfilter)

Required filter properties:
- BankAccountUUID

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionorderby)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionselect)

post.description: Is a request to cancel a bank account entry.

parameters.name: ID
parameters.description:
An identifier for a bank account entry.  
GDT: BankAccountEntryID

parameters.name: BankAccountUUID
parameters.description:
A BankAccountUUID is an universal unique identifier of a bank account.  
Filter: Only 'Eq' is supported as logical operator.  Integrity Conditions: If cross-navigation is used, filter for BankAccountUUID must not be used.  GDT: NOSC_UUID

CancellationReasonCode.title: Coded representation of the cancellation reason for a bank account payment entry.

post.description: Is a request to return a bank account entry.

parameters.name: ID
parameters.description:
An identifier for a bank account entry.  
GDT: BankAccountEntryID

parameters.name: BankAccountUUID
parameters.description:
A BankAccountUUID is an universal unique identifier of a bank account.  
Filter: Only 'Eq' is supported as logical operator.  Integrity Conditions: If cross-navigation is used, filter for BankAccountUUID must not be used.  GDT: NOSC_UUID

BankAccountPaymentEntryReturnReasonCode.title: Coded representation of the return reason for a bank account payment entry.

parameters.name: ID
parameters.description:
An identifier for a bank account entry.  
GDT: BankAccountEntryID

parameters.name: BankAccountUUID
parameters.description:
A BankAccountUUID is an universal unique identifier of a bank account.  
Filter: Only 'Eq' is supported as logical operator.  Integrity Conditions: If cross-navigation is used, filter for BankAccountUUID must not be used.  GDT: NOSC_UUID

get.description: Is a request to query return specification for a bank account entry.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionfilter)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionselect)

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET BankAccountEntries HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--

ID.title: An identifier for a bank account entry.

BankAccountUUID.title: A BankAccountUUID is an universal unique identifier of a bank account.
BankAccountUUID.description: Filter: Only 'Eq' is supported as logical operator.  Integrity Conditions: If cross-navigation is used, filter for BankAccountUUID must not be used.  GDT: NOSC_UUID

PaymentTransactionReferenceID.title: A Reference number for a transaction in payment transactions.

ChangeStateID.title: An identifier for a change status.

BankAccountPaymentEntryTypeCode.title: A coded representation of the type of a bank account payment entry.
BankAccountPaymentEntryTypeCode.description:
Remark: Applicable for only BankAccountEntryTypeCode 1 (Bank Account Payment Entry).  
GDT: BankAccountPaymentEntryTypeCode

BankAccountPaymentEntryOriginTypeCode.title: Coded representation of the origin type of a bank account payment entry.
BankAccountPaymentEntryOriginTypeCode.description:
Remark: Applicable for only BankAccountEntryTypeCode 1 (Bank Account Payment Entry).  
GDT: BankAccountPaymentEntryOriginTypeCode

StatusCode.title: Coded representation of the status of an payment entry of a bank account.
StatusCode.description:
Filter:  Only 'Eq' is supported as logical operator.  
GDT: BankAccountEntryStatusCode

BankPaymentTransactionTypeCode.title: Coded representation of the type of the BankPaymentTransaction.
BankPaymentTransactionTypeCode.description:
Filter:  Only 'Eq' is supported as logical operator.  
GDT: BankPaymentTransactionTypeCode

BankPaymentCommunicationChannelCode.title: Coded representation of the communication channel for payments in a bank.

ExchangeRateTypeCode.title: Coded representation of the type of an exchange rate, used to define the exchange rate for two given currencies.

ExchangeRateTypeName.title: The name of a exchange rate type.

ExchangeRate.title: The rate at which the currency specified at TransactionCurrencyAmount can be exchanged into the currency of BankAccountCurrencyAmount.
ExchangeRate.description: The element Rate within ExchangeRate, represents the rate of conversion between currency of TransactionCurrencyAmount (QuotedCurrency) and the currency specified by BankAccountCurrencyAmount (UnitCurrency).

BankAccountPaymentEntryReturnReasonCode.title: A coded representation of reason for return of a bank account payment entry.
BankAccountPaymentEntryReturnReasonCode.description: Remark: Applicable for only BankAccountPaymentEntryTypeCode 2 (Receiver).  GDT: BankAccountPaymentEntryReturnReasonCode

BankAccountPaymentEntryReturnReasonName.title: A name of a ReturnReasonCode.
BankAccountPaymentEntryReturnReasonName.description:
Reason why a payment entry was returned.  Remark:  Applicable for only BankAccountPaymentEntryTypeCode 2 (Receiver). 
GDT: MEDIUM_Name

CancellationReasonCode.title: Coded representation of the cancellation reason for a bank account payment entry.
CancellationReasonCode.description:
This code is applied to both the entries that are affected by the process of cancellation  (reversal with reference to original payment entry).  
GDT: BankAccountPaymentEntryCancellationReasonCode

BankPaymentNetworkAffiliationCode.title: A coded representation of an affiliation to a bank network.
BankPaymentNetworkAffiliationCode.description:
Remark:  Applicable for only BankAccountPaymentEntryTypeCode 2 (Receiver).  
BDT: BankPaymentNetworkAffiliationCode

SystemPostingDateTime.title: Time point at which an entry is posted in the system.
SystemPostingDateTime.description:
Remark: The posting date time is the system time stamp (system date / time) in the UTC time zone (converted).  Use: The SystemPostingDateTime can be used to sort bank account entries in a chronological order (per posting date). 
GDT: GLOBAL_DateTime

BankAccountPostingDate.title: The date on which the bank account entry is posted to the corresponding bank account.

BankAccountValueDate.title: The date on which the amount of the bank account entry becomes relevant for interest calculation of the bank account.

PendingPaymentAvailabilityStartDate.title: Specifies the date from which the pending payment becomes available.

BankAccountCurrencyAmount.title: The amount of the bank account payment entry in the currency of a bank account.

TransactionCurrencyAmount.title: The amount of bank account payment entry in the transaction currency of a business transaction.

BankAccountDebitIndicator.title: Indicates whether an account has been debited during an account movement.

CancellationDocumentIndicator.title: Indicates whether the item is a reversal item.

LimitCheckDeactivationRequestedIndicator.title: Indicates whether deactivation of limit check was requested for processing the bank account entry.
LimitCheckDeactivationRequestedIndicator.description:
The limit of the bank account is the available amount of the bank account. The LimitCheckDeactivationRequestedIndicator will deactivate the check of available amount of the bank account for which the bank account prenote entry is to be created.  
GDT: Indicator

AdditionalMaterialChecksDeactivationRequ.title: Indicates whether deactivation of the all material checks (except limit check) is requested for processing the bank account entry.

ReturnAllowedIndicator.title: Indicates whether a return of the bank account entry is, in general, allowed or not.

Note.title: A note about a bank account payment entry.

AdditionalNote.title: An additional note about a bank account payment entry.

MaterialCheckNote.title: A note for processing customer owned checks for a payment entry.
MaterialCheckNote.description:
Constraint: Maximum 65 characters are allowed.  
GDT: LANGUAGEINDEPENDENT_MEDIUM_Note

MaterialCheckAdditionalNote.title: An additional note for processing customer owned checks for a payment entry.
MaterialCheckAdditionalNote.description:
Constraint: Maximum 6 characters are allowed.  
GDT: LANGUAGEINDEPENDENT_SHORT_Note

BankAccountHolderName.title: The name of  the bank account holder, which is specified in the bank account payment entry.
BankAccountHolderName.description:
Applicable for only BankAccountEntryTypeCode 1 (Bank Account Payment Entry).  
GDT: BankAccountHolderName_V1

OriginalBankAccount.title: The bank account on which the original payment entry must be posted.

OriginalPaymentTransactionInitiatorBankA.title: The bank account of the party to which the receivable or payable belongs, and which originally initiated the payment or debit memo.

FinalPaymentTransactionDestinatedBankAcc.title: A FinalPaymentDestinatedBankAccount is the bank account of the party for which the payment or credit memo is intended.

Reference.title: References of the bank account entry.

BusinessProcessChainAssignment.title: Business Process Chain Assignment is the assignment of a business object node to a business process chain.

com.sap.gateway.default.bankaccountentry.title: Bank Account Entry
com.sap.gateway.default.bankaccountentry.description:
A Bank Account Entry is a balance-relevant entry for a Bank Account.  A Bank Account is an account that holds funds in a bank and is subject to deposits and withdrawals.  

Remark: Only bank account entries of BankAccountEntryType 1 (Bank Account Payment Entry), 2 (Bank Account Revenue Expense Entry) and 4 (Bank Account Tax Entry) are selected.  

Paging shall be supported for BankAccountEntry.

com.sap.gateway.default.bankaccountentry.title: Return Specification
com.sap.gateway.default.bankaccountentry.description: A Return Specification specifies for a returnable bank account payment entry, the valid return reason code and the latest date on which the bank account payment entry can be returned by using the particular reason code.  Remark: Only applicable for bank account entry of type 1 (Bank Account Payment Entry).

A currency must always be specified.

RoutingID.title: Number of the bank in a clearing system (see GDT BankRoutingID).

CountryCode.title: Country in which the bank identified earlier goes about its business. If the bank is a member in a national clearing system, the country to which this clearing system belongs is entered here. Constraint: Only listID 3166-1 of listAgencyID 5 will be supported.

PaymentTransactionOrder.title: An instruction to execute a payment transaction.

DirectDebitMandate.title: The authorisation given by a debtor to a creditor to initiate instructions to debit funds owed to the creditor from a specified account, and the authorisation to the debtor bank to comply with the instructions issued by the creditor.

BankAccountPrenoteEntryReferenceID.title: An identifier for a bank account prenote entry.

ChequeReferenceID.title: A ChequeID is a unique identifier for a check.

ChequeReferenceID.title: A ChequeID is a unique identifier for a check.

ID.title: Bank account number (Basic Bank Account Number, BBAN). An account number that is assigned by the account managing bank. It uniquely identifies a bank account in most countries only together with the bank.

StandardID.title: International bank account number (International Bank Account Number, IBAN).

InternalID.title: BankAccountInternalID is a proprietary identifier for a bank account.

UUID.title: A UUID is an universal unique identifier of a bank account.

CurrencyCode.title: CurrencyCode is a coded representation of the currency of the bank account.

Bank.title: Bank where the account is held.
